full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` SPRUL PA'I SKU BLO BZANG DBANG CHEN DPAL 'BAR PAntI TA NO MONG KHANG LA GSOL 'DEBS BRTAN BZHUGS MDZAD 'PHRIN RGYAS PA'I SMON TSIG DANG BCAS PA NI,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006B (CES SPRUL PA'I SKU BLO BZANG DBANG CHEN DPAL 'BAR PAntI TA NO MONG KHANG LA GSOL 'DEBS BRTAN BZHUGS MDZAD 'PRHIN RGYAS PA'I SMON TSIG DANG BCAS PA CIG DGOS ZHES DPON AER TE NI CING DBANG DANG, GRVA TSANG GSUM GYI SLOB DPON GRVA RIGS, PHYAG MDZOD BLO BZANG MKHAS MCHOG ,DBUS TZENG THO YON, AA CHI THU DAR RGAN NANG SO SOGS KYIS BSKUL BA'I MNGOR, SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG BLO BZANG YE SHES KYIS SMRAS PA'O, ,)
